title: Create apology website for Maham with interactive reveal

requirements.text: Create a landing page that displays 'Maham' as a clickable name element

quotes: u have to click her name to get to the apology

acceptanceCriteria: The name 'Maham' is displayed prominently on the landing page
The name is clearly clickable with appropriate hover states
Clicking the name reveals or navigates to the apology message

requirements.text: Display an apology message that appears after clicking the name 'Maham'

quotes: u have to click her name to get to the apology

acceptanceCriteria: Message is clearly readable and well-formatted

requirements.text: Implement a pink and red color scheme throughout the website with all text rendered in white

quotes: use pink and red as main colours and all text to be white

acceptanceCriteria: Primary colors used are pink and red
All text elements display in white color
Color scheme is applied consistently across all components
Sufficient contrast exists between background colors and white text for readability

requirements.text: Design a creative, romantic visual theme with elegant typography and smooth transitions that complement the apology context, using the pink/red color palette throughout
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design feels cohesive and appropriate for an apology message
Typography choices enhance readability and emotional tone
Transitions and interactions feel smooth and polished
Layout is clean and focused on the core interaction

nonGoals: Backend data persistence or user authentication
Multiple pages beyond the reveal interaction
